import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export var initialState={currentUser:{},isAuthenticated:false,error:false,msg:'',loading:true};var authSlice=createSlice({name:'auth',initialState:initialState,reducers:{login:function login(state){state.loading=true;},// eslint-disable-next-line
loginSuccess:function loginSuccess(state,_ref){var payload=_ref.payload;state.currentUser=payload;state.isAuthenticated=true;state.loading=false;state.error=false;},loginError:function loginError(state,_ref2){var payload=_ref2.payload;state.msg=payload;state.error=true;state.isAuthenticated=false;state.loading=false;},logout:function logout(state){state.loading=true;},logoutSuccess:function logoutSuccess(state){state.isAuthenticated=false;state.currentUser={};state.error=false;state.msg='';state.loading=false;}}});var _authSlice$actions=authSlice.actions,login=_authSlice$actions.login,loginSuccess=_authSlice$actions.loginSuccess,loginError=_authSlice$actions.loginError,logout=_authSlice$actions.logout,logoutSuccess=_authSlice$actions.logoutSuccess;export{login,loginSuccess,loginError,logout,logoutSuccess};export default authSlice.reducer;
